amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $17 million appropriated for the Advanced Light Water Reactor Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for energy supply, research and development activities by $17 million. The intent of the bill is to terminate funds for the Advanced Light Water Reactor Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 211 (Roll no. 357).
